AI can Repair Itself A robot that rebuilt itself after noticing its performance had dropped after losing two of its six legs. The robot did not know what the problem was but fixed it by trial and error.
AI Recognises Emotions A robot built in the late 1990s called Kismet can recognise emotions through human body language and voice tone.
